block.p: The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week:
Community Health Systems Inc., Brentwood, Tenn., an initial public offering of 18.8 million shares, 15.9 million in the United States and Canada. Merrill Lynch.
The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week:
Community Health Systems Inc., Brentwood, Tenn., an initial public offering of 18.8 million shares, 15.9 million in the United States and Canada. Merrill Lynch.
Intuitive Surgical Inc., Mountain View, Calif., an initial public offering of eight million shares. Lehman Brothers.
UbiquiTel Inc., Bala Cynwyd, Pa., an initial public offering of 14.5 million shares. Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette.
Urban Cool Network Inc., Dallas, an initial public offering of two million shares. Kashner Davidson Securities.
